item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Megan Thee StallionThis piece really means a lot to me and I hope it touches everyone 🙏🏾 I will never bite my...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Megan Thee Stallion

This piece really means a lot to me and I hope it touches everyone 🙏🏾

I will never bite my tongue, I will never allow anyone to silence me, I will never be scar...ed to stand up for myself and others, and I DAMN SURE WILL NEVER BE SCARED TO BE MY TRUE AUTHENTIC STRONG BLACK SELF 💙 thank you The New York Times Opinion Section for the platform and thank you to all the beautiful women involved ✊🏾✊🏾✊🏾✊🏾

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Kaila Adia Story#HappyIndigenousPeoplesDay !! 📚🤸🏾‍♀️🖤✊🏾 “...Every year, I’m appalled that...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Kaila Adia Story

#HappyIndigenousPeoplesDay !! 📚🤸🏾‍♀️🖤✊🏾

“...Every year, I’m appalled that Columbus Day is still on the calendar. It’s embarrassing that we would honor any Europ...ean for “discovering” America. Aside from the fact that giving this credit to Columbus is historically inaccurate, it’s cognitive dissonance that allowed our teachers to say “Columbus discovered America in 1492” in one breath and then to teach us about “Native Americans” in another. It should have been obvious that a man can’t discover a place where people already live. This same cognitive dissonance pervades our American identity, way of thinking and lifestyle in every single way..."-Norm Halm #HappyIndigenousPeoplesDay ✊🏾🖤💯📚🔥

See More

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280+3New Women SpaceHappy Indigenous People’s Day!! To celebrate we’ve compiled a list of 10 Indigenous-owned...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280+3New Women Space

Happy Indigenous People’s Day!!

To celebrate we’ve compiled a list of 10 Indigenous-owned businesses to show some love for this powerful and important day.

All-...natural medicines, ceremonial elixirs, makeup, home decor, fashion, traditional and contemporary, coffee, and MORE, ALL by Indigenous folx!!

As always please keep the list growing by tagging your favorite BIPOC and/or Queer BIPOC businesses and companies that are helping maintain tradition and their communities while also moving them forward in 2020.

#supportinclusion #diversity
#newwomenspace #nationalindigenouspeoplesday #supportqueerbusiness
#supportbipocbusinesses #color #selfcare #fashion #jewelry #makeup #skincare #art #indigenous #queerindigenous #twospirit

See More

item.title: How Sway?
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

How Sway?

Jessica Louise is feeling drained.

Are y’all making arrangements for people to get to the polls if they want to vote or is it mostly just logging in online and yelling, into the void, 🗣VOTE!

Bc ...folks don’t have identification, are at risk for being turned away due to not knowing their rights at the poll, lack transportation, and don’t have schedules or resources that will accommodate participating in (early or otherwise) voting.

How are you filling the gap OUTSIDE OF these performative, shame-inducing posts to engage this process?

See More

item.title: Black women, you are not failing, and we love you.
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Black women, you are not failing, and we love you.

Chi Ilochi

I don’t know who needs to see this, but please sis take it one day at a time. You’re human. And you’re doing your best. It’s okay to not be okay 💜✨

item.title: #DEMANDS...
item.content:encoded:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

item.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
item.content:encoded:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org

Black Lives Matter 5280
